spec.name: Le Patio Restaurant
spec.description: Le Patio Restaurant (The Patio Restaurant) is a dining establishment in Casablanca specializing in **Mediterranean cuisine**. The name suggests a core feature: an inviting outdoor or enclosed courtyard (patio) for dining, which provides a comfortable and atmospheric setting, particularly popular in Morocco's climate. The restaurant offers a modern menu, often featuring fresh, seasonal ingredients and a relaxed ambiance.
